fields.summary: iOS: Property check on proxy always returns true

comments.body:
*Closing ticket*, Verified fix in SDK Version: {{7.4.0.v20180717131401}}

*FR Passed (Test Steps):*
# Created a titanium Application 
# Added the following code in the description in to the {{app.js}}
# Ran the program 
# Following was seen in the console (Proxy for non-existing property no longer always set to true):
{code:java}
[DEBUG] :  ### hasProperty check ###
[DEBUG] :  non-existing property
[DEBUG] :  proxy: false
[DEBUG] :  plain: false
[DEBUG] :  existing property
[DEBUG] :  proxy: true
[DEBUG] :  plain: true
{code}

*Test Environment*
{code:java}
APPC Studio: 5.0.0.201712081732
APPC CLI: 7.0.4
iPhone 6 simulator (11.2)
Operating System Name: Mac OS High Sierra
Operating System Version: 10.13
Node.js Version: 8.9.1
Xcode 9.2
{code}
